Software Development

Gvero's Pintokyo Games develops and manages IT applications as well as software tools according to the needs of our clients. In the institutions such as Médecins Sans Frontières and Credit Suisse, we have developed IT applications, using modern technologies such as Spring Boot, React, Jekyll, Oracle DB and MS SQL. During the university research at EPFL, we also implemented software development and testing tools. In addition, we participated in the various projects in which we processed and analyzed data.

If you need advice and more information, do not hesitate to contact us.
